resources.string:
Donate the leftovers at your house or restaurant by posting. Provide a location from where others can collect it. You will be sent an SMS if anyone is interested in collecting your leftover.


Swipe Right

You can collect the leftover of others. While collecting, show the message that was sent from your messaging inbox.



Swipe Left or Right

Need help or hava a complaint?
Call our helpline or mail us.



Swipe Left
